message: Let's start fair. I'm offering you 40% of the money.  What do you say?
I'll give you a smaller share, but it's still a good deal. You can't expect me to give you more than 30%!
I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split it 45/55. I'm not sure this game will last much longer with our current inflation rates!
I'm starting to get a bit desperate, but I'll give you a 50/50 split. It's not ideal, but it's better than nothing. Let's just get this over with.
